name: A Vista
description:
Welcome to A Vista!

The world is run by music-crazed robots after a nuclear war, and the humans live in vaults under the earth. Miho, a young punk-rocker, decides to leave the vault and tries to find her missing father.

In the game, you form a band and play musical duels against robot bands in turn-based action. Each turn is played in beats, where all characters move in time with the music. Time your attacks, and perform chords between your characters to gain bonuses and defeat your opponent!

Enjoy the amazing music! Each level has its own song, through which the story is told
